name: Expeditionay League: Amaril's Amulet
description:
2D fantasy Rogue Lite developed in Unreal Engine 4 using Paper 2D. Take the rol of a young Expeditionary sent to find the Amulet of the Captain Knight Amaril, wich is told to protect the wearer against demons. 

How to play:

  • I explain it on this post on my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/posts/game-description-21273181
  • If you need help or have feedback, just comment :D
